fullName.invalidFormat: Full Name must contain only letters, hyphens, apostrophes, and single spaces between words
fullName.tooShort: Full Name must be at least 2 characters long

email.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
email.invalidFormat: Email must be from these domains: icloud, gmail, yahoo, outlook or hotmail

password.tooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password.invalidFormat: Password must include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

currentPassword.tooShort: Current Password must be at least 8 characters long
currentPassword.invalidFormat: Current Password must include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

newPassword.tooShort: New Password must be at least 8 characters long
newPassword.invalidFormat: New Password must include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

confirmNewPassword.mismatch: New password and confirm new password don't match

coverFile.invalidMime: Cover file must be a JPEG or PNG image

avatarFile.invalidMime: Avatar file must be a JPEG or PNG image

title.tooShort: Title must have at least 5 characters.
title.tooLong: Title must have less than 60 characters.

description.tooShort: Description must have at least 20 characters.
description.tooLong: Description must have less than 250 characters.

categories.min: At least one category is required.

cover.invalidMime: Only JPEG and PNG files are allowed.

quizTitle.tooShort: Quiz title must have at least 5 characters.
quizTitle.tooLong: Quiz title must have less than 60 characters.

image.invalidMime: Only JPEG and PNG images are allowed.

feedback.tooLong: Feedback must be 500 characters or less.

rate.mustBeInteger: Rating must be a whole number.

Toasts.validationError: Invalid or missing inputs. Try again.
Toasts.initialProgressfailed: Error when try to update level. Try again.

users.addFailed: Failed to create user. Try again.
users.updateFailed: Failed to update user. Try again.
users.duplicatedEmail: Email already in use. Try another.
users.deleteSuccess: {count, plural, one {User deleted successfully.} other {# users deleted successfully.}}
users.deleteFailed: {count, plural, one {Failed to delete user. Try again.} other {Failed to delete # users. Try again.}}

auth.loginFailed: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

googleProviderError.unauthorizedClient: This Google account cannot be used. Try a different one.
googleProviderError.accessDenied: Access denied. Please allow permissions to continue.
googleProviderError.default: Google authentication failed. Please try again or use another method.

auth.signupFailed: We couldn't create your account. Please try again later.
auth.duplicatedCredentials: This email is already registered. Try logging in instead.
auth.emailNotSent: We couldn't send the email. Please try again later.
auth.tooManyRequests: You've made too many requests. Try again in {timer} {timer, plural, =1 {second} other {seconds}}.
auth.emailVerificationSent: A new verification email has been sent. Check your inbox.
auth.expiredCode: Your verification code is invalid or has expired.
auth.verificationSuccess: Your email has been successfully verified.
auth.emailResetSent: Reset code sent successfully. Please check your inbox.
auth.userNotFound: No account found with this email. Please check and try again.
auth.verificationError: There was an error while verifying your code. Please try again later.
auth.resetPasswordError: Something went wrong during the password reset process. Please try again.
auth.passwordIncorrect: The current password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
auth.samePassword: The new password cannot be the same as the old password. Please choose a different one.
auth.resetPasswordSuccess: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.

tests.uploadError: Failed to upload cover. Try again.
tests.updateFailed: Failed to update test. Try again.
tests.addFailed: Failed to add test. Try again.
tests.deleteSuccess: {count, plural, one {Test deleted successfully.} other {# tests deleted successfully.}}
tests.deleteFailed: {count, plural, one {Failed to delete test. Try again.} other {Failed to delete # tests. Try again.}}

settings.updateFailed: Failed to update your account details. Please try again.
settings.updateSuccess: Your account details have been updated successfully.
settings.deleteAccountFailed: Failed to delete your account. Please try again or contact support.
settings.deleteAccountSuccess: Your account has been deleted successfully. We're sorry to see you go.
